net.rim.device.api.input
Interface ITextInputConnector

All Superinterfaces:
IInputLocationRequests
public interface ITextInputConnector
extends IInputLocationRequests

Implementing this interface, a 3rd party may define an input framework request handler and a listener for receiving text input events from the input framework. It's to be registered with an InputHelper instance calling InputHelper#setTextInputConnector(ITextInputConnector listener)

Since:
BlackBerry API 6.0.0

Method Summary
